intro: This document serves as a detailed nomenclature guideline for the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service's Coastal Zones product, specifically focusing on land cover and land use (LC/LU) classification. It provides a comprehensive description of all level 5 classes within the nomenclature, including their geographic characteristics, input datasets, and interpretation methods. The guideline aims to ensure consistency and accuracy in the mapping of coastal zones across the EEA39 countries, supporting the monitoring and assessment of these dynamic environments.
